import React, { Fragment } from 'react'; import { Container, Header, Image } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import './Sidebar.css' import headshot from '../images/headshot.png' export default function Sidebar({ mobile }) { const sidebarClass = mobile ? 'center-mobile' : 'vert-center' return (
